entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023
